definition.achievementDescription: Craft infinitite armor with a godlium base, infinitite core, and all infinitite except for one ultrite placed after the core!
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="80"><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:InfinititeArmor.helmet</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:InfinititeArmor.body</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:InfinititeArmor.legs</field></block></value><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:InfinititeArmor.boots</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
